org.dmd.dmp.server.servlet.base
Interface EventBusIF

public interface EventBusIF

The EventManagerIF interface defines an entity that acts as an event bus within the web server.

Method Summary
 void fireCreateEvent(DmcNamedObjectIF object)
          Fires an event that indicates that an object has been created.
 void fireDeleteEvent(DmcNamedObjectIF object)
          Fires an event that indicates that the specified object has been deleted.
 void fireModifiedEvent(DmcObject object)
          Fires an event that indicates that an object has been modified, usually by some mechanism within the server itself.
 void fireModifiedEvent(SetRequest request)
          Fires an event that indicates that an object has been modified by the specified SetRequest.
 

Method Detail

fireCreateEvent

void fireCreateEvent(DmcNamedObjectIF object)
Fires an event that indicates that an object has been created. This is only valid for named objects.

Parameters:
object - the object that was created.

fireDeleteEvent

void fireDeleteEvent(DmcNamedObjectIF object)
Fires an event that indicates that the specified object has been deleted.

Parameters:
object - the object that was deleted.

fireModifiedEvent

void fireModifiedEvent(SetRequest request)
Fires an event that indicates that an object has been modified by the specified SetRequest.

Parameters:
request - The request that modified the object.

fireModifiedEvent

void fireModifiedEvent(DmcObject object)
Fires an event that indicates that an object has been modified, usually by some mechanism within the server itself. The specified object MUST have a modifier associated with it e.g. the object is a modification recorder.

Parameters:
object - The modified object.
